titles.title: UNDERSTAND Act
UNDERSTAND Act
Utilizing National Data, Effectively Reforming Standards and Tools, to Address Negative Determinates of Health Act

A bill to amend title XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to collect information under Medicare, Medicaid, and the Children's Health Insurance Program related to social determinants of health, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
Utilizing National Data, Effectively Reforming Standards and Tools, to Address Negative Determinates [sic] of Health Act or the UNDERSTAND Act
This bill requires the collection and reporting of social determinants of health that may affect Medicare, Medicaid, and Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP) beneficiaries and individuals who receive services at federally qualified health centers. Social determinants of health include educational, employment, housing, and family circumstances.
